_comment: Git workflow configuration for Claude Code plan commands. All options have defaults - this file is optional.

strategy.description: Branching strategy: 'branch-per-plan' creates one branch per plan, 'branch-per-phase' creates a new branch for each phase.

branch_prefix.description: Prefix for plan branch names. Example: with 'plan/', a plan named 'my-feature' creates branch 'plan/my-feature'.

auto_commit.description: Automatically commit changes after each task completion. Set to false for manual commit control.

merge_strategy.description: Default merge strategy for /plan:complete. 'squash' combines all commits, 'commit' preserves history with merge commit, 'ff' fast-forwards if possible.

archive_branches.description: Create archive tags before deleting branches. Tags preserve commit history after squash merge.

archive_retention_days.description: Days to retain archive tags before /plan:cleanup considers them for deletion.

sync_remote.description: Automatically push to remote after branch creation and task commits. Requires remote 'origin' to be configured.

phase_tags.description: Create git tags when phases complete. Tag format: plan/{name}/phase-{N}.

enforce_branch.description: Require being on the correct plan branch for plan commands. Set to false for legacy workflows.

cleanup_age_days.description: Days of inactivity before /plan:cleanup considers a branch stale.

team_workflow._comment: Configuration for team workflows with remote sync and PR creation

strict_workflow._comment: Strict workflow with branch enforcement and long retention
